comprehensive_overview: OpenSYCL is an open-source SYCL (Standard C++ for Heterogeneous Programming) implementation, aiming to provide a high-level abstraction for programming heterogeneous systems using C++.
core_features: Enables writing C++ code for heterogeneous platforms
Utilizes standard C++ parallel programming models
Supports various accelerators like GPUs, FPGAs, etc.
Facilitates easier parallel programming for heterogeneous systems
